notes: [Improved] Moved release feed to Github
[Improved] Improved examples and documentation
[Fixed] Fixed issue where Plain text fields with character limits could throw errors
[Added] Added support for seeding Commerce Products with Variants and Commerce Products Relations field
[Added] Added Sprout SEO Redirect Helper tool for converting redirects from a Spreadsheet into JSON
[Improved] Improved support for Weeding and Keeping Seed data
[Improved] Improved performance of generating and saving mock data
[Improved] Added `type` and `details` to the Seed log
[Improved] Updated Weed log to track Seeded items on a per-import basis
[Improved] Improved various example JSON files
[Fixed] Fixed issue where undefined field variable could occur when using Field Importer
[Fixed] Fixed issue with default settings for field importer when null
[Fixed] Fixed issue where Sections without URLs enabled would throw an error
[Fixed] Fixes bug on weed page where redirect would not happen after successful
weeding
[Added] Added support for importing Sections with multiple locales
[Improved] Improved error messages in several scenarios
[Improved] Cleaned up syntax in various examples
[Fixed] Fixed bug where User Import would throw error if not using Craft Pro
[Fixed] Fixed broken links in UI
[Fixed] Fixed bug where macro was not included on Seed and Weed tab
[Added] Public beta
[Added] Private beta
